page.title: 21Royal Arthur Update
page.content: HMS Royal Arthur in Corsham closed in the 1990s and is now a derelict, vandalised eyesore. A sad but not untypical fate to so many military establishments once they are abandoned. In Corsham, the same fate has afflicted nearby RAF Rudloe Manor, a highly visible site at the top of Box Hill, whilst, within half a mile, the even more visible Copenacre site has also just closed and no-doubt awaits the same treatment.
